feed.title: translatewiki.net - Recent changes [en]
feed.subtitle: Track the most recent changes to the wiki in this feed.

summary.p: Updating to match new version of source page

td.style: background-color: #fff; color: #202122; text-align: center;
background-color: #fff; color: #202122; text-align: center;

background-color: #f8f9fa; color: #202122; font-size: 88%; border-style: solid; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 4px; border-radius: 0.33em; border-color: #eaecf0; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre-wrap;

td.div: * [[Translating:Grant Metrics|Grant Metrics]] is a simple, easy to use interface for reporting shared metrics on WMF wikis.

td.div: * [[Translating:Grant Metrics|Grant Metrics]] is a simple, easy to use interface for reporting shared metrics on WMF wikis.

td.style: color: #202122; font-size: 88%; border-style: solid; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 4px; border-radius: 0.33em; border-color: #ffe49c; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre-wrap;
td.div: * [[Translating:Wikimedia Grants Review|Wikimedia Grants Review]] is a grant proposal review tool for the Wikimedia Individual Engagement Grants project.

td.style: background-color: #f8f9fa; color: #202122; font-size: 88%; border-style: solid; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 4px; border-radius: 0.33em; border-color: #eaecf0; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre-wrap;
td.div: * [https://tracker.wikimedia.cz Tracker] is an expense tracking app used by Wikimedia Czech Republic.
